channel.title: Free Web-Design/Graphic Design & Forums Set-up!
channel.description:
Okay guys, I'm looking to build a portfolio for my web-design and graphics career. I figure a good way to do this would be to offer my services free of charge (As I know here at Mopar we like to keep the slate clean and stay away from scammers and fraudsters) So let's get to business! I'm not going to post any of my resent web-designs on here I'm just going to be posting the ones I do for you guys, to request a website simply fill in the form below. Now remember these are free designs I won't be putting my best into this but I'll certainly make sure you're happy with what you get. As these are obviously going to be used in a portfolio they can't be a pile of shit, let's just put it simply.
[b]FORM[/b] Mopar Username: Template Theme: (What will your website be for?) Template Style & Design: (Show me colors/examples/information) Pages: (Do you need a forum, Register functions, Pages?) Skype Name: (So we can keep in touch) Agree with TOS?: Yes/No (All websites are copyrighted, abuse this copyright and you will be reported.)
This thread was created so I could gain a portfolio, nothing else. Sorry if it's rushed. If people are interested I'll updated the thread and make it look a little better.

item.title: Free Web-Design/Graphic Design & Forums Set-up!
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

What do you mean by this:

Agree with TOS?: Yes/No (All websites are copyrighted, abuse this copyright and you will be reported.)

If you’re designing websites surely the client should have some freedom to do what he wants with it? If it’s like a small copyright in the footer or something then yeah sure but what exactly are you’re TOS?

Add my skype pls too

Read full topic
